bibl.bibl: Kowsky, Francis R. 1985. In defense of Niagara: Frederick Law Olmsted and the Niagara Reservation. In The distinctive charms of the Niagara scenery: Frederick Law Olmsted and the Niagara Reservation, edited by Charles E. Beveridge for the Buscaglia-Castellani Art Gallery. Niagara Falls, N.Y.: Niagara University.
